document_name: Order No. 99-0277 / PR / MATETA establishing the National Steering Committee on Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DJI/1999/DJI-1999-11-05-Order No. 99-0277 _ PR _ MATETA establishing the National Steering Committee on Climate Change_8564e6917877fd1da519bf0edb6e04d6.pdf
document_description: This Order creates the National Steering Committee for Climate Change whose role is to: supervise all activities related to climate change at the national level and supervise the project management team; give a general orientation on actions to be taken in the field of climate change; coordinating institutional structures dealing with climate change issues.
